name: >> CLICK to locate more MISS KIKI Boutique Collection dolls
description:
To purchase a recently handcrafted one of a kind doll from our Petites or Sweet Vintage Romance Collections, please visit one of our retailers.

MISS KIKI retailers, including online boutiques, may be found via the STOCKISTS page.

Price bracket for selected styles {$40-$250)

name: *RETAILER REWARD* Pre-Christmas Orders
description: SOLD OUT - ORDERS CLOSED.

name: DROP-SHIP ORDERING (PRODUCT)
description:
Drop-ship per product for online retailers that have formed an agreement with MISS KIKI to drop-ship our product.

Drop-ship product options;

~ Petite Collection Doll
~ Sweet Vintage Romance Doll
~ Bespoke Custom Made Petite Doll
~ Bespoke Custom Made Sweet Vintage Romance Doll

Expected turnaround from placement of order to shipment: up to 2 weeks.

PLEASE ENSURE YOU SELECT THE APPROPRIATE QUANTITY OF DROP-SHIP POSTAGE IN ADDITION TO YOUR PRODUCT SELECTION.

name: DROP-SHIP ORDERING (POSTAGE)
description:
Postage is calculated inclusive of registered shipping with tracking and signature on delivery.

Postage is to be paid PER INDIVIDUAL CUSTOMER ORDER.

name: Gifts & Rewards
description:
Shhh... what's inside Evie's Closet?

At MISS KIKI we are fortunate to have such wonderfully loyal customers, selecting new companions from our collection for their children or for their collection. 

Every so often we love to show our appreciation by offering a gift alongside our luxury dolls. Gifts with purchase are extremely limited, offered randomly on occasion.

We are pleased to presently have a Gift on offer.

$25 Gift Certificate (pdf version) for $1 with the purchase of a Bespoke Collection Petite Miss Kiki Doll, Little Vintage Boy or Charley Marley Pirate.

** Upon request, if the Gift Certificate is for a friend, please note in comments at checkout and we shall send it gift boxed **

Disclaimer: To receive your gift, Gift with purchase must be added to your boutique bag and paid for in the same transaction as your Bespoke Collection Doll purchase. Offer is only available through the MISS KIKI website and not at boutique stockists. Gift certificate is to be used on a future purchase on the MISS KIKI website and is not redeemable for cash.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Be REWARDED for recommending our collection to family and friends!

Enjoy a VIP discount when you like and share our official facebook page on your wall. Simply SHARE to 'public', (must be a generic share not mentioning the offer or discount) and put the link to our website in the first comment. Then take a printscreen once you've received likes and/or comments and email our studio. We will return email you with your unique code to shop our Bespoke Collection in our online boutique!

Simply LIKE and SHARE to receive 5% discount
Receive 25 individual likes/comments on your post ~ 10% discount
Receive 50 individual likes/comments on your post ~ 20% discount
Receive 100 individual likes/comments on your post ~ 30% discount 

Disclaimer: The above offer is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2013
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.

name: Discounted Dolls
description:
Oh, the joy of receiving a surprise gift and the delight in opening it to find some Miss Kiki gorgeousness!

We are delighted to be able to offer very few Boutique Dolls in Evie's Closet at different times throughout the year. 

Listed dolls are either the last of a previous season collection, the last of a limited edition, dolls created for media publications that are back in our studio or dolls we have kept in studio for our private collection.

At a humble price including free shipping, we trust you will be pleasantly surprised when your Miss Kiki parcel arrives.


Enjoy FREE SHIPPING. All items are sent registered post.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2014
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.

name: PRESTIGE Custom Placement
description:
Often the choice for our most affluent customers, we offer our PRESTIGE custom placements, for those who seek a truly unique custom piece. 

Gracing palaces and celebrity homes alike, these truly unique collection pieces are handcrafted to perfection.

PRESTIGE clients are directly serviced by Kate from design to completion. Kate handcrafts all PRESTIGE collection pieces.

Should you wish your doll be custom handcrafted, adorned with a fabric selection unique only to she/he and never to adorn another of our collection pieces, a PRESTIGE custom piece is for you. Kate will work closely with you to select specific style and colourway, sourcing the finest unique designer fabrics, laces and embellishments from her most favoured boutiques locally and across the globe. 

PRESTIGE custom dolls are accompanied by a gold charm, personally selected for each client, by Kate and engraved.

Beautifully scented and placed in a handcrafted organza slip, PRESTIGE dolls are then wrapped and boxed with our custom ribbon, ready for gifting.

~ ♥ ~

Unique, petite designer cloth dolls for collection, keepsake or play. Each artisan handcrafted doll is one of its kind.

Miss Kiki custom order dolls are an exclusive collection piece as they may be created to your style with the option of a hand embroidered name or initial of your loved one. PRESTIGE custom dolls are handcrafted by Kate.

Created with the finest designer fabrics, laces and embellishments sourced from around the world, each doll is filled with 100% eco-friendly corn fibre filling, and presents named and vanilla scented in a handcrafted organza slip. Every Miss Kiki doll has the hand embroidered Kiki derriere and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity embossed with our signature. The Petite Collection measures 25-30cm tall. Sweet Vintage Romance Dolls measure 35-45cm tall.

Please note your custom request in the comments section upon checkout. You are also welcome to contact our studio via the contact form to discuss your order directly with Kate.

PERSONALISATION
Complexion ~ cream or cocoa
Hair ~ ash blonde, vintage brown, chocolate, auburn, black, ruby red, pastel pink, shabby printed fabric
Hair Style ~ petite pigtails, long pigtails, side ponytail, bun
Eyes ~ black, brown, green, hazel, blue with lashes, demure lashes
Style ~ soft pastels, shabby floral, brights
Colouring ~ choose up to 3 shades to allow fabric selection

You are encouraged to mention past collection dolls that you admire for consideration of the style you desire. 

Please allow 4 to 6 weeks for delivery. 

MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane dolls are handcrafted in our Australian studio.  

Enjoy FREE SHIPPING throughout Australia. All items are sent registered post. International shipping available.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2014
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.

name: PRESTIGE Gift Certificate
description:
We offer our PRESTIGE Gift Certificates, for those who seek to gift a certificate for a truly unique handcrafted custom piece, personally serviced and handcrafted by Kate. 

Gracing palaces and celebrity homes alike, these truly unique collection dolls are handcrafted to perfection. A PRESTIGE Gift Certificate is sure to delight the most eloquent and discerning elite.

PRESTIGE clients are directly serviced by Kate from design to completion. Kate handcrafts all PRESTIGE collection pieces.

Often the choice for our most affluent customers, a PRESTIGE Gift Certificate gifts the bearer a collection piece custom handcrafted, adorned with a fabric selection unique only to she/he and never to adorn another of our collection dolls. Kate will work closely with the recipient to select style and colourway, sourcing the finest unique designer fabrics, laces and embellishments from her most favoured boutiques locally and across the globe.

PRESTIGE custom dolls are accompanied by a gold charm, personally selected for each client, by Kate and engraved.

Should you wish to select more than one valued amount and have these values on the ONE Gift Certificate, please email our studio with your request. 

Life Moments Gift Certificates are a set of 3 certificates to gift as one to the recipient or to set aside for each significant life moment. These may be birth of a child, the child's first birthday and the child's first Christmas or perhaps a wedding remembrance for a flowergirl or bridesmaid, a graduation and a special anniversary. Please note significant moments upon checkout should you wish for these to be noted on the Gift Certificates.

Beautifully scented, gift wrapped and boxed for gifting.

~ ♥ ~

A perfect gift for a unique keepsake, whether gifting to a collector, a new mother or for a special occasion, a Gift Certificate will surely delight the recipient of such a thoughtful and unique gift.

Beautifully textured linen card, eloquently presented rolled in a quaint detailed bomboniere gift box tied with our custom Miss Kiki ribbon and embossed with our signature they are sure to delight. 

Each Certificate comes embossed with our personal signature for authenticity. They are sent registered post to ensure traceable shipping with required signature on arrival.

PLEASE NOTE NAME OF RECIPIENT & NAME OF GIVER IN COMMENTS SECTION AT CHECKOUT. ALTERNATIVELY YOU MAY EMAIL OUR STUDIO VIA THE CONTACT FORM.

**Please note that no change will be given and Gift Certificate must be used in one transaction. PIN Code will only apply to one checkout then be invalid. Not valid at stockists.

Enjoy FREE SHIPPING throughout Australia. All items are sent registered post. International shipping available.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2014
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.

name: Custom Placement Request Petite Collection Miss Kiki Doll
description:
Unique, petite designer cloth dolls for collection, keepsake or play. Each artisan handcrafted doll is one of its kind.

Petite Collection Dolls are a beautiful collection handcrafted in studio by Kate and her artisans. The Petite Collection measures 25-30cm tall and is exclusive to boutiques Australia-wide.

Miss Kiki custom order dolls are an exclusive collection piece as they may be created to your style with the option of a hand embroidered name or initial of your loved one. 

Created with the finest designer fabrics, laces and embellishments sourced from around the world, each doll is filled with 100% eco-friendly corn fibre filling, and presents named and temporarily scented with Madagascan vanilla flower oil, in a handcrafted organza slip. Every Miss Kiki doll has the hand embroidered Kiki derriere and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity embossed with our signature.

Please note your custom request in the comments section upon checkout. You are also welcome to contact our studio to discuss your order.

PERSONALISATION
Complexion ~ cream or cocoa
Hair ~ ash blonde, golden blonde, vintage brown, chocolate, auburn, black, ruby red, pastel pink, shabby printed fabric
Hair Style ~ petite pigtails, long pigtails, side ponytail, bun
Eyes ~ black, brown, green with lashes, blue with lashes, demure lashes
Style ~ soft pastels, shabby floral, brights
Colouring ~ choose up to 3 shades to allow fabric selection

Please note all dolls are one of a kind and hence specific fabric choices are not accepted due to limited stock levels. You are encouraged to mention past collection dolls that you admire for consideration of the style you desire noting that this is an indication only of the doll you may receive.

Please allow 2 to 4 weeks for delivery.

MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane dolls are handcrafted in our Australian studio.  

Enjoy FREE SHIPPING throughout Australia. All items are sent registered post. International shipping available.

name: Custom Placement Request Angel of My Heart Doll
description:
Angel of My Heart Dolls are a unique keepsake for bereaved parents grieving the loss of their child. A one of a kind doll embroidered with their child's name and birth date to love and to treasure their memory forever. Handcrafted in soft pinks and blues, each doll is embroidered with 'Angel of My Heart'.

Angel of My Heart Dolls are styled from our Petite Collection. These dolls have been created in company with Franchesca, the beautiful creative soul and heart behind Small Bird Studio, to bring comfort to bereaved parents across Australia, the United States and the world. These dolls are petite at 25-30cm tall.

Gift Certificates are also available. 

Please advise the following in the comments section at checkout;
~ Cream or Cocoa complexion
~ Eye colour or demure lashes
~ Name to be embroidered (one only please) and birth date

You are also welcome to contact our studio at to discuss your order.

Created with the finest designer fabrics, laces and embellishments sourced from around the world, each doll is filled with 100% eco-friendly corn fibre filling, and presents named and temporarily scented with Madagascan vanilla flower oil, in a handcrafted organza slip. 

Personalisation on these dolls are machine embroidered. Every Miss Kiki doll has the hand embroidered Kiki derriere and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity embossed with our signature.

Please allow 2 to 4 weeks for delivery.

MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane dolls are handcrafted in our Australian studio. 

Enjoy FREE SHIPPING throughout Australia. All items are sent registered post. International shipping available.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2014
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.

name: Handmade by Destiny Rescue
description:
Destiny Rescue dolls have been designed in Australia by MISS KIKI and  created using the finest linens and designer fabrics by young girls rescued out of slavery and sex trafficking in Thailand by an amazing organisation based here in Australia called Destiny Rescue. Destiny Rescue supports Fair Trade and by purchasing these dolls you will be giving these girls the opportunity to maintain a liveable wage while purchasing a doll worthy of a story to tell.

Each doll arrives tagged with a new specially designed label that reads: Miss Kiki of Cherry Blossom Lane handmade by Destiny Rescue. They also have swingtags attached by Destiny Rescue acknowledging that they are handmade by the girls. Designs will vary in colourways pictured owing to their creativity and fabrics available at the time.

Two styles of dolls are available, representing the journey these rescued girls have traveled and their newfound freedom for themselves and their future children. Such are the "Freedom Collection" of Kiki Dolls and the "Liberty Collection" of BabyKiki Dolls.

'Free Spirit' dolls are sewn by young rescue girls learning to sew. Although they are not quite representative of the quality of the collection, having a few quirky aspects and speak of their own creativity, we are making them available to honour their childlike charm, value their contribution and give these young rescue girls a sense of pride and achievement. 

Please visit the blog to read more about our venture with Destiny Rescue and visit their website www.destinyrescue.org

Their presence in our collection is to give voice to this cause with the stability of our brand. All profits go back into materials for the girls to continue earning a liveable wage. They are very excited about creating this collection and are personally invested in each one, knowing it is voicing their freedom in Australia.

Quality control will take place in Thailand by DR's head seamstress and our affiliate. We will also inspect each doll as they arrive to our studio ready for their finishing touches. You can be assured of purchasing a beautiful product with an even more inspiring story. Please appreciate that due to cultural differences there may be some imperfect or quirky elements on the dolls but, they are created with great pride and joy. These dolls are better suited as a conversational piece or an older child's toy.

Thank you for supporting their FREEDOM.


**Boutique and Fair Trade Store orders most welcome**


Enjoy FREE SHIPPING throughout Australia. All items are sent registered post. International shipping available.

© MISS KIKI of Cherry Blossom Lane® 2011-2014
All Rights Reserved. All designs and original concepts are copyright protected.
